biotools.summary: CITE-sort is an artificial-cell-type aware surface marker clustering method for CITE-seq data. CITE-sort conducts auto-gating with CITE-seq ADT data using recursive Gaussian Mixture Model. It is robust against artificial cell types that stem from multiplets. CITE-sort also provides concrete explanations of its internal decision process by constructing a biologically meaningful sort tree. See our paper for more details.
